content: I’m so sick of the arrogance of those working in tech and design telling other creatives — and writers, especially — they should produce work for free to get jobs. Bullshit. If someone is going to respect your work, they’ll pay you. And, as I wrote recently, don’t devalue my work by not charging for yours. Don’t Devalue My WorkDon’t devalue my writing by not valuing your own.inadequate.net Would you lose your SS if you earned more than their low limit?
